home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
home.faq.q1: Is this the official Belgian driving exam?
home.faq.a1: No, ReadyRoad is a practice platform. We follow the official exam format (50 questions, 45 minutes, 82% passing score) to help you prepare for the real exam.
home.faq.q2: Are the questions from the actual exam?
home.faq.a2: Our questions follow the official Belgian driving exam standards and cover all required topics, but they are for practice purposes only.
home.faq.q3: How many times can I take practice exams?
home.faq.a3: Unlimited! Take as many practice exams as you need to build confidence and improve your score.
home.faq.a4: Yes, the platform is currently free while in development. Premium features may be introduced later.
home.faq.a5: We support English, French, Dutch, and Arabic with full RTL (right-to-left) support for Arabic learners.
home.faq.q6: Can I use ReadyRoad on my phone?
home.faq.a6: Yes! ReadyRoad works on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile.
